title: Shadowfall Shorts
description: Shadowfall Shorts is our short story collection, featuring four It's Dru's birthday and she's celebrating at Shadowfall - what better birthday present could she get than an evening with one of Seattle's Unholy Trinity?Discover how Kane deals with an interloper with light fingers.Meet Hawk, who has just arrived in Seattle and discovers an old flame is already there.Have you read Bonded in Blood? Want to know why Morgan shot Taz? Here's an exclusive short story showing how they met in Vegas.
